titleStmt.title: The speech of Sir Edward Turner knight, speaker of the honourable House of Commons, to the Kings most excellent Majesty, on Monday the eleventh day of April, 1670. Upon the adjournment of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Turnor, Edward, Sir, 1617-1676.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Includes "His Majesties gracious speech" adjourning Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
